import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardGroup, Col, Container, Form, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Row } from "reactstrap"; import firebase from './../../../config'; const styleExists = { color: '#FF3300', display: 'block' } const Login = () => { const [account, setAccount] = useState({}); const [err, setErr] = useState(false); const handleLogin = () => { const ref = firebase.database(); ref .ref("users") .orderByValue() .equalTo(account) .on("value", async snapshot => { console.log(snapshot.val()) if (snapshot.val() === null) { setErr(true) } else { setErr(false) } }); } return (
